alert.note: Alert for Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:40PM CDT until September 09 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ERATH AND CENTRAL COMANCHE COUNTIES... At 439 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Leon, or 11 miles north of Comanche, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Comanche, Dublin, De Leon, Proctor Lake, Comyn, Downing, Proctor, Van Dyke, and Hasse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
